If we cross paths again as friends, even better. But I only develop deep meaningful friendships and relationships from being friends first and foremost. I'm old enough to know those are the one's who are worthy of your time, passion, and energy. The rest either suck it from you, or you from them, or both. So, friends first. No exceptions.

If you are still interested, I am turning 53 later this month. I am completely happy with who I am, and the choices I make. I could be happier of course, but I am happily content. I have been alone for 7 years or so. I was married in High School, until then. I have spent these past few years working on myself. When you marry as a teen, it kinda just happens that you either under develop, or don't ever develop as a stand alone individual person. So, I have discovered who I am, like me for the most part, and continue to work on what *I* don't like. I used to need a lot of time and attention. I loved fun and happy social events, etc. I am not sure if I actually needed it, as much as I thought I did, but perspective is reality, so I did. 

I am happy alone now. In my solitude and journey, I have discovered the joy of nature, animals, and countless things I barely noticed at all before. I have learned to let go, and get over my egocentric thoughts that I can be the change that someone else has to be for themselves. I am more than over myself now... Well I am sure ego is still there since I would probably do some plastic surgery if I had endless surplus of money, which I do not. However, I always have more than I need, so I am blessed, and grateful. 

If you have read this far in hopes that I am some hot 53 year old yoga instructor or something, well you are going to be sad to hear that I have only attempted yoga in my home 3 times. I am absolutely interested in it, and once I get over my need to look good in the yoga wear first, I might actually go to a class. I love the wisdom and education my years have brought to me. I do not geniunely appreciate the aging process. Although I am commonly told I look younger, and am guessed 10 plus years younger, I feel like my body suddenly got depressed, and sagged and wrinkled like a depressed shar pei puppy or something, lol. I have not ever had the luxury of pampering and worrying about all the things I now wish I had. But alas is life. We are blessed to be old enough to sag and wrinkle... but I probably would still have a little work if I were wealthy. I am human. And sometimes vain. Not often, but sometimes.

I am currently 5'2 and 148lb. I am not a BBW, nor solid muscle. I am what I would call a little soft and pudgy which makes me cringe. But, it is absolutely honest of *my* assessment. I still need to lose 15-20pounds as I am a short lady. But I am hoping to meet some interesting friends here to get me out and active. I do walk 2-4 miles several days a week, but totally inconsistent. I am interested in being more active. I am up for anything like dancing, concerts, hiking, boating, tennis, etc. I just need to have my chill out, down time too. I miss the head on the shoulder, kiss on the neck, the behind you hug, etc. I miss the play and banter. So, I guess it is time to get out there and see if anyone catches my attention, and vice versa. 

If you are interested please take time to do the following. Include who you are, your actual age, and if inclined, a picture. I am not into in really big men, sorry. Some pudge, and extra is fine, I mean no offense. I do not like rude, arrogant people, but no other requirements for religion, political affiliation, race, etc. Just be honest, fair, kind, and fun =). Please tell me why you think you would be a good "date" for me, or vice versa? If I get multiple replies I will contact each one who takes time to reply. I will be picking based on instant attraction, instinct, or curiosity of some sort, etc. I am not looking at a 6'4, 220 lb athlete, with full head of hair, 155 IQ, etc. I have great instant reads on things a lot of the time. And I like some attributes more than others, or am oddly drawn to some unexpected something. So, I hope to hear from someone, if there is someone here I am supposed to meet.
